name: Authenticated Session
description: This object describes the session created by a successful user or process authentication.

uid.description: The session identifier, as reported by the operating system, which can help to correlate this event with another events that can contain the same session ID.
uid.name: Session ID

uuid.description: The unique session identifier, as reported by the operating system. For example, Windows session GUID.
uuid.name: Unique Session ID
